Citation.Paragraph:
The subgenus
Aulacomyrma Aulacomyrma was erected by Emery (1921
Citation.Name: Emery

Citation.Paragraph:
as a subgenus of
Polyrhachis Polyrhachis Fr. Smith with
Polyrhachis porcata P. porcata Emery as the type species. He characterized the subgenus by the following: first gastral segment occupying a large portion of the gaster, anteriorly elevated and projecting above the petiolar scale; scale biconvex with arched dorsal margin terminating on each side in acute teeth; mesosoma stout, partly marginate; humeri armed with teeth or spines; body sculpture consisting of regular, more-or-less coarse furrows. Emery (1921
Citation.Name: Emery

Citation.Paragraph:
also included another four species in the subgenus, P. dohrni Forel, exarata Emery,
Polyrhachis excellens excellens Viehmeyer and
Polyrhachis serrata serrata Fr. Smith. Evidently he had doubts about including
Polyrhachis serrata serrata , but continued to list this species as
Aulacomyrma Aulacomyrma with a question mark (Emery, 1925
Citation.Name: Emery

Citation.Paragraph: until Donisthorpe (1932
Citation.Name: Donisthorpe

Citation.Paragraph:
placed it ultimately under
Echinopla Echinopla Fr. Smith. Chapman & Capco (1951
Citation.Name: Smith. Chapman & Capco

Citation.Paragraph:
misspelt the name as
Aulocomyrma Aulocomyrma and included six species,
Polyrhachis exarata P. exarata ,
Polyrhachis excellens excellens ,
Polyrhachis mystica mystica Karavaiev,
Polyrhachis pallipes pallipes Donisthorpe ,
Polyrhachis porcata porcata and
Polyrhachis serrata serrata , with the last species listed twice (under
Polyrhachis Polyrhachis and
Echinopla Echinopla ). Bolton (1995
Citation.Name: Bolton

Citation.Paragraph:
listed nine species of
Aulacomyrma Aulacomyrma , including
Polyrhachis carbonaria P. carbonaria Fr. Smith,
Polyrhachis dohrni dohrni ,
Polyrhachis exarata exarata ,
Polyrhachis excellens excellens ,
Polyrhachis geometrica geometrica Fr. Smith,
Polyrhachis mystica mystica ,
Polyrhachis pallipes pallipes ,
Polyrhachis porcata porcata and
Polyrhachis schizospina schizospina Karavaiev. Dorow (1995
Citation.Name: Karavaiev. Dorow

Citation.Paragraph:
transferred
Polyrhachis carbonaria P. carbonaria to the subgenus
Polyrhachis P. (Myrma) and synonymized
Polyrhachis mystica P. mystica with
Polyrhachis cryptoceroides P. cryptoceroides Emery within the subgenus
Polyrhachis P. (Myrmhopla) . Kohout (1998
Citation.Name: Kohout

Citation.Paragraph:
considered the type of
Polyrhachis schizospina P. schizospina to be a queen of
Polyrhachis numeria P. numeria Fr. Smith a species within the subgenus
Polyrhachis P. (Myrma) .
Polyrhachis sculpta P. sculpta Emery , listed by Emery (1925
Citation.Name: Emery

Citation.Paragraph: Chapman & Capco (1951
Citation.Name: Chapman & Capco

Citation.Paragraph: Bolton (1995
Citation.Name: Bolton

Citation.Paragraph: and Dorow (1995
Citation.Name: Dorow

Citation.Name: Bolton

Citation.Name: Kohout

Citation.Paragraph: Male. A single associated male is known for only one species (wardi) and as such has been omitted from this work. Hung (1967
Citation.Name: Hung
